item.description: Join NHC'er John at Delaney's this Saturday between 1pm and 5pm for the 4th annual chili cookoff and beer tasting. There will be 75 beers to taste from over 40 breweries, live music, raffles and door prizes. Tickets are $30 in advance or $35 at the door, and all proceeds go to the American Cancer Society. If you have any questions, you can email John or reach him at 203-500-1039.
item.name: 4th Annual Chili Cookoff and Beer Tasting at Delaney's
